content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Complex at position(x=37-41, y=-85 to -87)
Consists of following entities:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (37.0,-85.0), (39.0,-85.0), and (41.0,-86.0)
- Storage chests at positions (36.5,-86.5), (39.5,-83.5), and (40.5,-87.5)
- Burner inserters at positions (35.5,-86.5) and (35.5,-85.5)
All drills are currently out of fuel but positioned over coal resources

### Iron/Copper Mining Operation at position(x=-28, y=-61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0,-61.0) positioned over iron and copper ore
- Storage chest at (-27.5,-59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5,-59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-27.0,-58.0)
- Output inserter at (-25.5,-58.5) and storage chest at (-24.5,-58.5)

### Iron Mining Complex at position(x=-6 to -10, y=-59)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills at positions (-10.0,-59.0), (-8.0,-59.0), and (-6.0,-59.0)
- Storage chests at positions (-9.5,-57.5), (-7.5,-57.5), and (-5.5,-57.5)
- Transport belt system connecting the components
- Multiple burner inserters managing material flow

### Smelting Line at position(x=0 to 6, y=0)
Consists of:
- Four stone furnaces at positions (0.0,0.0), (2.0,0.0), (4.0,0.0), and (6.0,0.0)
- Input chests at (0.5,-2.5), (2.5,-2.5), (4.5,-2.5), and (6.5,-2.5)
- Output chests at (0.5,2.5), (2.5,2.5), (4.5,2.5), and (6.5,2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters managing input/output

### Power Generation System at position(x=-3.5 to 4.5, y=17.5 to 27.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5,27.5)
- Boiler at (-1.5,22.0)
- Steam engine at (4.5,20.5)
- Pipe network connecting components
- Small electric poles providing power distribution

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract items
- Must be within interaction range of the target chest/entity before attempting to extract items
- Verify the chest actually contains the items you're trying to extract

### Entity placement errors
- Check if target position is already occupied before placing new entities
- Ensure proper spacing between entities according to their tile dimensions

### Fluid system connection errors
- Ensure proper pipe connections between fluid producing/consuming entities
- Maintain continuous pipe networks without gaps

### Power system issues
- Keep fuel supplied to boilers to maintain steam production
- Ensure electric pole coverage reaches all electrical consumers

### Mining operation efficiency
- Keep mining drills supplied with fuel to prevent work stoppages
- Monitor output chest capacity to prevent backups
